ApiClient module

class ApiClient.ApiClient[source]

Bases: ABC

abstract Request(url: str, query)[source]

This function sends the request into the respective API Connector

Parameters:

  • url – full URL of the request

  • query – This is what we want to request from WCL

Returns:

It returns nothing since it’s an abstract class

base_url = None
